help.title: Need a help?
help.content: You will be redirected to Mahidol Disability Service Support

impairment_level.title: Impairment Level
impairment_level.level_1: 1 - Requires use of equipment or device

announcement.line_placeholder: LINE OA for contact e.g., https://line.me/ict.mahidol

validation.geolocation: Invalid Geolocation, Latitude and Longitude should be a number
validation.latitude: Invalid Latitude, Latitude must be a number between -90 and 90
validation.longitude: Invalid Longitude, Longitude must a number between -180 and 180
validation.line: Invalid Line OA, Line OA should be a URL e.g., https://line.me/ict.mahidol
validation.website: Invalid Website, Website should be a URL e.g., https://www.ict.mahidol.ac.th

accessibility_level.level_1: This place is hard to access even got the help
accessibility_level.level_2: Require help from person and equipment to visit this place
accessibility_level.level_3: This place can access with assistance from another
accessibility_level.level_4: This place can access by use of equipment or assistance from another
accessibility_level.level_5: This place can access by use of equipment
accessibility_level.level_6: This place can access by use of equipment or by yourself
accessibility_level.level_7: This place can access without any help
accessibility_level.title: Accessible Rating

image.drag: Drag images here or click to select files
image.description: Can attach more than 1 file, each file must not exceed 10 MB

facility.details: Information about the wheelchair-friendly facilities at the place.
